metadata.title: CVE-2017-14528 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: The TIFFSetProfiles function in coders/tiff.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6 hasincorrect expectations about whether LibTIFF TIFFGetField return valuesimply that data validation has occurred, which allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (use-after-free after an invalid call toTIFFSetField, and application crash) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in esm-infra/xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2020-10-26').
